body_html:
@sungjin712
open third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL from the root dir and add this line cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include" next to other cxx_builtin_include_directory: "xx" lines.
body_text:
@sungjin712
open third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL from the root dir and add this line cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include" next to other cxx_builtin_include_directory: "xx" lines.
body:
@sungjin712 
open `third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL` from the root dir and add this line `cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include"` next to other `cxx_builtin_include_directory: "xx"` lines.
